mapper.sql: CXID, SJH, KSLX, SFZH, XM, KSNF, NNKSBS, TJCXSJ, CXBZW, FHCXSJ, CXJGZT, YZBM, YHSFCK, YHCKSJ

mapper.update:
update T_CXB_INFO
SJH = #{sjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSLX = #{kslx,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SFZH = #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSNF = #{ksnf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NNKSBS = #{nnksbs,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TJCXSJ = #{tjcxsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CXBZW = #{cxbzw,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FHCXSJ = #{fhcxsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CXJGZT = #{cxjgzt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
YZBM = #{yzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YHSFCK = #{yhsfck,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
YHCKSJ = #{yhcksj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CXID = #{cxid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update T_CXB_INFO set SJH = #{sjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSLX = #{kslx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SFZH = #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSNF = #{ksnf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NNKSBS = #{nnksbs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TJCXSJ = #{tjcxsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CXBZW = #{cxbzw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FHCXSJ = #{fhcxsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CXJGZT = #{cxjgzt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YZBM = #{yzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHSFCK = #{yhsfck,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YHCKSJ = #{yhcksj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CXID = #{cxid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select:
select
from T_CXB_INFO where SJH = #{sjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CXID DESC

select
from T_CXB_INFO where SJH = #{sjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CXBZW=1 AND YHSFCK=1 AND CXJGZT=1 ORDER BY CXID DESC

select
from T_CXB_INFO where SJH = #{sjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CXBZW=1 AND YHSFCK=0 AND CXJGZT=1 ORDER BY CXID DESC

select
from T_CXB_INFO where SJH = #{sjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CXBZW=0 ORDER BY CXID DESC

select
from T_CXB_INFO where SJH = #{sjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CXBZW=1 AND CXJGZT=0 ORDER BY CXID DESC

select
from T_CXB_INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_XTRZ_INFO on T_CXB_INFO.SJH=T_XTRZ_INFO.YHSJH ORDER by T_CXB_INFO.TJCXSJ ${order}
select count (T_CXB_INFO.CXID) from T_CXB_INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_XTRZ_INFO on T_CXB_INFO.SJH=T_XTRZ_INFO.YHSJH
